评论概述: Cozy and Stylish 2-Piece Lounge Sets for Women
评论详情: These lounge sets are perfect for a relaxed and comfortable day. The soft, breathable fabric makes them ideal for lounging around the house or running errands. The matching sweatshirt and shorts create a stylish and coordinated look. The loose-fitting style provides ample room for movement, making these sets perfect for lounging or exercising. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish outfit.

评论概述: STYLISH + COMFORTABLE. GREAT FOR SPORTS, WORKING OUT, LOUNGING, ERRANDS, AND CASUAL OUTFIT!
评论详情: The Casey Lamiit Two Piece Set is becoming a staple in my wardrobe! I will be ordering more colors.  The black looks and feels great on, and is comfortable and not stiff or scratchy.  The shorts index the skirt are comfortable, and not so tight like some others.  The fabric is smooth and soft.  The shape of the set is flattering.  This set is easy to wear and versatile, and the pieces can be worn together or as separates.  I have worn and washed this set three times to accurately determine the overall quality, feel, level of comfort, and more.  I received many compliments on it.  It washes well, and I hang this set to dry.  I am a size Small, and ordered up to Medium in case it ran small, and I like the extra room. My normal Small would have been fine also.  This is a set of great quality and style, and I recommend it!  Enjoy!

Cute as can be, fits really nice and comfortable. The bottoms are "Skorts" style (Shorts/Skirt) which is a major plus for me. Material is good quality, Not thin , just right. I ordered the large I'm 5"6 160lbs and it fits perfect.

This set is a perfect blend of comfort and style, ideal for transitioning into fall. The soft, breathable fabric feels luxurious on the skin, and the skort with built-in shorts offers practicality with two pockets that are great for carrying essentials like your phone and keys. The skort stays in place even during workouts. Whether you're working out, running errands, or lounging around, this set is a versatile option. This outfit is perfect for cooler months when you want to be comfortable yet fashionable.

This 2-piece tracksuit, combining a sweatshirt with skorts, is a fantastic blend of sweats and tennis fashion. The design is unique and stylish, making it stand out from typical workout wear. The sweatshirt is cozy and the skorts offer a sporty yet chic look, perfect for both casual outings and athletic activities. The quality and design make it well worth the price. If you're looking for something that merges comfort with fashion, this tracksuit is a great choice!

This 2 piece set is well made and looks classy on. The pieces can be worn separately, but also look great together. This is a nice versatile set for running errands or playing a sport. The material is a medium weight stretchy material with a silky finish on the inside. It has a bit of a cooling feeling when I put it on. The skirt has shorts, but they’re not tight fitting like biking shorts. They are a little looser than that. The drawstring is functional and the shape of the skirt creates a nice silhouette. Excellent quality for the price. I have already ordered more colors.

This will be a great set for lounging, running errands, and going for walks in the neighborhood.  I would definitely recommend this set!

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable, with a Wish for Pockets
评论详情: I recently received the Casly Lamiit Two Piece Set, and I must say, it’s become one of my favorite outfits. The set includes a casual sweatshirt and skorts, making it versatile for lounging, tennis, or casual outings. The material is incredibly soft and comfortable, providing a cozy feel without sacrificing style.  I received numerous compliments while wearing it, which is always a nice bonus. The design is trendy and flattering, perfect for a relaxed yet put-together look. However, one feature I missed was pockets. It would have been even more practical with pockets, especially for holding small essentials.  Overall, this two-piece set is a great choice for anyone looking for a stylish and comfortable outfit. Despite the lack of pockets, the softness and flattering design make it a standout addition to my wardrobe. Highly recommended for its comfort and style!
Outfit is very soft and stretchy, could have sized down but like the top bigger

评论概述: Not your mom’s workout outfit, so cute and on-trend!  Super comfy too!!!
评论详情: This outfit is a fun twist on any warmup type outfit. When I say a fun twist, I mean this is not your mom’s warmup outfit…this is super cute and so on-trend.  You get a cute skort with 2 pockets in the shorts portion of the skort, perfect for keys, ID, and your phone, meaning that you can bring all those imperative essentials (and not a bag!) when you go out to walk, run, play tennis, etc. The material is super soft, again, not a sweatsuit per se, but has that heavier weight feel that you need during cooler months, without the “sweat suit” feel. The material is super soft and comfy, and if you want to you can even lounge around the house in this on the weekends…it’s that comfy. But what I love most about this outfit is that you can have that comfy feel, while looking cute.  The shorts underneath didn’t seem to ride up while working out in it, the skort is a nice length, about 1-2 inches above my knee (I’m 5’8” for reference) is not see through, has a nice classic line, and is cute to mix and match. There is a drawstring ribbon at the waist, perfect for adjusting easily if you do lose weight, so this will still fit beautifully during that transition.  The neckline isn’t to high or low, actually it is just right, and the relaxed collared neckline adds a little panache and style to the shirt, and it has almost a split high-low hemline. The material for both skort and shirt are stretchy, yet it holds its shape.  I ordered this in the charcoal gray for something different, but do love all the color options with this! Also, I ordered up a size just because I like my exercise clothes super roomy, but could easily go down one size, and would be fine.  This is that something cute that you can splurge on for those cooler months (think Fall!) when the weather gets a little cooler, but you still want to be comfortable when you work out.
Fits well, loose and comfy. If between sizes go down. High quality material. So soft and cozy!

I was pleasantly surprised when I received this set. Runs true to size. Quality is great for the price. 2pc set. Thinking of ordering in another color as well! Reed n for a 4 and not 5, I haven't washed it yet. If problems after washing, I'll update this post if allowed.

Its washes and dries fine I washed it on gentle and dried it on low and the fit is still the same. Overall I'm pretty happy with this set and I would recommend this to anyone looking for workout clothing.
This set is so cute, so soft, and lightweight enough to wear now. 100% recommend! Fits just a tad bit oversized I’d say.
